item.title: [PI] Attacking NPC In area if slayer task
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Hey Guys, Iâ€™m trying to add a slayer dungeon to my PI server, I have it all set up so you can only enter the dungeon if your slayer task consists of the monsters that are inside the dungeon, But i wanna make it so you can only attack your slayer task.

I have made a boolean in player.java which is this

public boolean inSlayerDung() { return absX >= 2683 && absX <= 2829 && absY >= 9958 && absY <= 10067; }

How can i make it so you can only attack slayer task though?

Read full topic
